definitions.definition: Intensifier; to a large degree; extremely ; exceedingly ; very ; unbelievably .
examples: He seems mad keen on her.
definitions.label_groups: slang , chiefly New York , African-American Vernacular , UK and Ireland , dialectal

main_definition: ( slang , chiefly New York , African-American Vernacular , UK and Ireland , dialectal ) Intensifier; to a large degree; extremely ; exceedingly ; very ; unbelievably .
